title: Total Damage Mitigated, Dealt and Seconds for specific items? (like runes)
body:
Hey Riot Team,

I like the way you guys introduced the new runes and even added little informations on how much value they have had in the game by showing some numbers ingame or post game when looking up on the scoreboard under the tab "runes".

Thats where other items comes to play, and i would love to see some numbers on items like "Mercury Treads" and such to see how much Crowd Control got reduced by only their effects alone for example "5,44 seconds of crowd control duration has been reduced" or "Ninja Tabi" - "1200 physical damage has been blocked"  like the little info on phantom dancer showing how many deaths have been avoided!

That might give me an example on if the boots were useful in the specific game when i face alot of AP damage but cannot really compare the effect of Mercury Treads to Ninja Tabis absorbing effect vs the enemy adc's alone ...

Just a little Suggestion here ... keep up the good work.

regardos
